content: मलिम्लुचः {@--1@} A robber, thief; न परेषु महौजसश्छलादपकुर्वंति मलिम्लुचा इव <ls>Śi. 16. 52.</ls> {@--2@} A demon. {@--3@} A gnat, mosquito. {@--4@} An intercalary month. {@--5@} Air, wind. {@--6@} Fire. {@--7@} A Brāhmaṇa who neglects the five daily Yajñas or sacrifices. {@--8@} The Citraka tree. {@--9@} Frost, snow.
